*p71868a0632*6	  3 	 cystic fibrosis results from mutations in the cftr gene.	mutations may occur at a number of positions within the gene, resulting in a range of clinical symptoms and severity of cystic fibrosis.	the effect of combining three different drugs to treat people with cystic fibrosis was investigated. 	people with cystic fibrosis were divided into two groups. one group was given the three-drug combination and the other group was given a control treatment.	the volume of air each person could forcefully blow out in one second (fev1) was measured.	the graph shows the results of this investigation.group given the  three-drug combinationgroup given the  control treatmenttime after treatment starteddecrease in mean fev1mean fev1 at the startincrease in mean fev1	(a)	 explain why the change in mean fev1 was used in this investigation.(3)
